treatment.reference: Synechocystis sp PCC 6803 Strains Lacking Photosystem I and Phycobilisome Function (Shen, G., et al., 1993)
treatment.description: this cyanobacterium is a spontaneously transformable facultative (photo)heterotroph showing homologous recombination and can survive in the absence of photosynthetic activity in the presence of glucose
